description:
Note : The Price will go up to ( 40 $ ) again soon .

( OVER Than 1238 Students Enrolled In This Course )

Create A Professional Facebook Page & Get First Likes For Beginners .

- We will learn how to create a Facebook page for any business to help your sales grow up through the Facebook , biggest social media network in the world .

- What is the different category for the Facebook page and we will learn how we can choose the right category for our Page after understanding the different between them.

- What is the featured and correct size for the Facebook page profile picture and Cover photo to look beautiful and attractive .

- How to customize the URL of the Facebook page after creating a new page ,to help the Facebook page to be index fast in the Google search .

- How to get the first likes and fans for the Facebook page for free and how we can start promoting the Facebook page to get more fans and page likes .

- How to link the Facebook page with the website or blogger to get more and free traffic from the Facebook page .

- How to turn on the Facebook Review in the page to higher the Facebook page ranking up in the Search Engines Results .

- How to build back-links for the Facebook page to get more likes from the other pages for Free and have a social prove to help your page have more ranking .
title: Create A Facebook Page For Business & Make Page SEO
